Reuse Culture Expo









Monday, May 1, 2023 - 4:00pm to 6:00pm 

    Location:
  

    USU Northridge Center  

    Cost:
  

    Free  


Reuse Culture Expo is an event hosted by AS sustainability as part of initiatives to cultivate a zero-waste and reuse lifestyle among CSUN students and staff. Participants are exposed to various sustainable fashion and zero-waste lifestyle brands. This year's event will include a brands showcase, a student entrepreneur showcase and keynote speaker session.
